official_title: A bill to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to review the report and findings of the Guam Reparations Commission.

summary.text: Requires the Comptroller General, not later than six months after the enactment of this Act, to review the Guam Reparations Commission's report and findings with respect to the disposition of claims documented by such Commission and to report to the Congress on such review.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Comptroller General of the United States to review the report and findings of the Guam Reparations Commission.
